data.title: Pace - Stancil Funeral Home and Cemetery
data.meta_description: Explore Life Stories, Offer Condolences & Send Flowers with Pace - Stancil Funeral Home and Cemetery obituaries and Death Notices for the Cleveland, TX area.
data.text: At Pace-Stancil Funeral Home and Cemetery, we believe that your loved one's life deserves to be celebrated and honored in a unique way that tells their story. That's why we go above and beyond to deliver excellence at each of our locations in Dayton, Coldspring, and Cleveland, Texas. Our compassionate team is dedicated to crafting funeral services that honors their individuality. We understand the importance of trust during this difficult time, which is why we take pride in being a locally owned funeral home that reinvests in your community. You can rely on us to provide the highest level of care for your family, friends, and guests.
